CURRICULUM VITAE  
PERSONAL DETAILS  
• Name:                          Dang Duy Tung 
• Date of Birth:   
 17 May,1990  
• Gender :                        Male  
• Marital Status:             Married 
• Ethnic Group:              Kinh 
• Religion: 
• Health:                       Good 
• Home Address:          Tan Hoa - Dong Thinh - Yen Lap - Phu Tho 
• Current Address:        No. 18, 322/158 Nhan My – My Dinh – Nam Tu Liem – Ha Noi 
• E-Mail Address:         tungdd175@gmail.com 
• Contact Telephone Number:       0973329521 
• Degree: Bachelor 
EDUCATION BACKGROUND

University of Engineering and

144 Xuan Thuy - Cau Giay 
District - Ha Noi - Viet Nam 
University, Ha Noi 
• 
GPA: 2.84/4.0 
CERTIFICATES / TRAINING 
• 08/2012: Awarded certified training Fresher at FSOFT company about embedded C 
programming. 
INTERESTS 
• Like new technology. 
• Favorite web programming. 
• Like activities, listen to music in my spare time. 
• Play football, play game. 
SKILLS 
• Programming languages: C/C++, Java, J2EE. 
• Knowledge: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Jquery, Ajax, JSF, Struts, Spring…. 
• Capability to work about in teams. 
• Can communicate in English. 
• Programming tool: Visual Studio, Eclipse, IntelliJ, SVN, VSS. 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
• 1-year experience position Developer at FPT Software  (08/2012-08/2013) with three 
projects as below :  
1. Project TJ (08/2012 – 12/2012): 
- Project description: Unit test code C on window XP. Compare the real output with 
calculating output. 
- Languages & spec, tools: C, C++, visual studio 2008, eclipse. 
- Responsibilities: Analyzing, basic design, detail design and implement function. 
Edit stub function is gen by the tool. Create formula on excel to test output. Fix bugs 
in the project. 
2. Project SU5000X (01/2013 – 06/2013):  
- Project description: SU5000X is a program which builds user interface run on WPF 
environment (WPF is Window Presentation Foundation). SU5000X is a job which 
refers to Flash sample code to XAML source code. 
- Languages & spec, tools: XAML, C#, Visual Studio 2010. 
- Responsibilities: Analyzing, basic design, detail design and implement function. 
Studying method to create animation with WPF. Studying method to create a style of 
controls (button, combo box, edit box, slider…) with WPF. Coding, testing with 
WPF. Fix some bugs in Project. 
3. Project Manage Books (07/2013 – 08/2013): 
- Project description: Design and code to create a simple library manage books at the 
web. 
- Languages & spec: Java, Eclipse, Mysql. 
- Responsibilities: Know about Java core, servlet, hibernate. Study create dynamic 
web is JSP file. Know CSS, javascript to create an effect on the web, the server is 
Tomcat. Study using Hibernate to connect with database. Know to use query database 
in MySQL. 
• 2+ years’ experience position Java web developer at ALTALAB limited company  
(10/2013 - ) with two projects : 
1. Project SPC_TDKT (work at FIS- FPT Information System 10/2013 – 01/2014): 
- Project description: That is a part of the software system the supreme people’s court. 
Software service of emulation and reward of court. 
- Languages & spec: Java, JSF, Primefaces, JDeveloper, Oracle database. 
- Responsibilities: code, fix bugs follow assigned tasks by a team leader. 
2. CRMVIET (Customer relationship management 02/2014 – 03/2016) :  
- Project description: Software service for management and customer care. 
- Languages & spec: Java, JSF, JBoss seam, richfaces, eclipse, birt report, MySQL, 
SVN. 
- Responsibilities: My jobs analyze, evaluate new requirement and design database. 
Then code, fix bugs follow design. I’m a team leader of a team of 3 people. I create 
new tasks for members of the team. Link demo product: http://demo.crmviet.vn 
(demo/123456). 
• 3 years’ experience position Java web developer at VNPT Technology (4/2016 – 
2/2018) and WALA Technology (2/2018 – now) with many projects: 
1. The main project is Smart Connected Platform (It’s about Internet of Things (IoT) 
Platform): 
- Project description: Develop new technology is platform IOT, MQTT broker to 
connect IoT devices. 
- Languages & spec: Java, Struts, Spring, Oracle, Mysql. Tools: Eclipse, IntelliJ, 
Sqlyog. 
- Responsibilities: I develop function follow by tasks: user, role, permission, 
customer, billing, charging, API… Link product: https://admin.thingxyz.net  
2. Some web application for IOT Platform: 
- Project description: Develop some web application for IOT platform: agriculture, 
vehicles, smart metering, Air Aquality Index (AQI)… 
- Languages & spec: Java, Eclipse, Struts, Spring, Mysql. 
- Responsibilities: develop, test, implement and maintain applications. Recommend 
changes to improve established java application processes. 
3. M2M SIM (Machine to machine SIM) : 
- Project description: System management SIM for devices, provisioning, change, 
cancel a subscription by the user, alert when overload data threshold, export report to 
the customer. Link product: https://m2m.vinaphone.com.vn   
- Languages & spec: Java, Struts2, Hibernate, Oracle database, Jasper report. Tools: 
Eclipse, Sql developer, Tortoise svn. 
- Responsibilities: design, implement applications. To take part in software and 
architectural development activities. Develop technical designs, develop application 
code for java programs.
